#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int T,x1,x2,y1,y2;
    int cx1,cx2,cy1,cy2;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while (T>0) {
        scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
        scanf("%d %d %d %d",&cx1,&cy1,&cx2,&cy2);
        long long tp=0,ans=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(cx2-cx1)*(cy2-cy1);
        if(max(x1,cx1)<min(x2,cx2) && max(y1,cy1)<min(y2,cy2))
            tp=(min(x2,cx2)-max(x1,cx1))*(min(y2,cy2)-max(y1,cy1));
        ans-=tp;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
        T--;
    }
}
